4 Trump set the issues for the Midterms: Foreign Influence. Didn't expect it. Trump chose it. It's Pedro, the guy mowing your lawn vs. India, Israel, China. I will go with Pedro. In 30 years his kids will be invested in the US, while India, Israel, China will still be sucking us dry. posted 28 minutes ago by breadbaker 6 comments award share report block .
